speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Thank you for calling ISS Insurance Singapore. My name is Sarah. How may I assist you today?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Hi Sarah, I need travel insurance. I'm really short on time, so can we make this quick?

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Certainly. I can help you with that. I just need to gather some details about your trip to understand your requirements. Could you please tell me where you'll be travelling from?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Singapore. We're based in Singapore.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Noted, thank you. And where is your travel destination?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Japan.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Alright. And how long will you be away for?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: It's a 10 day trip. Look, can we speed this up? I have a meeting soon.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Understood. How many people will be travelling, including yourself?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Two of us.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Thank you. And could you let me know the age group of the travellers?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: We're mostly around 41-55 years old.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay. Are there any particular activities you plan to do during your trip to Japan? This helps us understand the type of coverage you might need.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes, thatâ€™s the main point. We're going primarily for golf. So I need specific cover for that. My golf clubs need to be covered if they get lost or damaged. Also, what if I get sick and can't use the pre-booked green fees? Need reimbursement for unused green fees. And if I accidentally damage the golf buggy? Need coverage for that too. Oh, and is there any special benefit if I hit a hole-in-one? Heard some policies offer that.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay, thank you for sharing that. So, noted specific requirements for golf cover: protection for golf equipment against loss or damage, reimbursement for unused green fees due to unforeseen circumstances like illness, coverage for accidental damage to a rented golf buggy, and a benefit for achieving a hole-in-one. Have I captured that correctly?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes, yes, exactly. That golf stuff is crucial. Now, what about the standard things? Quickly.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Certainly. Just to ensure we cover all bases, besides the golf, are there any other concerns? For example, regarding health or potential disruptions?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Of course, the usual worries. What if one of us falls sick or has an accident over there? Need cover for emergency medical treatment, like hospital stays or doctor visits. That's essential.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay, noted the need for Medical Coverage including emergency treatment and hospitalisation.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: And trip cancellation! What if something happens just before we leave, like a serious illness or injury, and we have to cancel the whole thing? Need cover for that.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Understood. Requirement for Trip Cancellation cover due to reasons like unforeseen illness or injury.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: What about flights being delayed? If we get stuck somewhere because of a major delay, we need cover for extra hotel nights and meals, right? Missed connections too.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Yes, noted. Coverage for additional expenses due to significant Travel Delays.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: And luggage! Apart from the golf clubs, what about our normal bags getting lost or damaged by the airline? Need reimbursement for that.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay, cover for Lost or Damaged Luggage, including reimbursement for essentials if it's delayed. Noted.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Just a couple more quick clarifications. Are there any pre-existing medical conditions we should be aware of for either traveller?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: No, no pre-existing conditions.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: And are you travelling with any special medical equipment?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: No special equipment.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Alright, thank you. So just to quickly summarize the requirements you've mentioned: Standard coverage including Medical expenses, Trip Cancellation, Travel Delays, and Lost/Damaged Luggage. And specifically for your golf trip: coverage for golf equipment, reimbursement for unused green fees, cover for accidental damage to a golf buggy, and a hole-in-one benefit. Is that all correct?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes, that sounds right. That covers everything. So what's next? Can I get a quote now?

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Thank you for confirming. I have noted down all your requirements. The next step is for our team to identify the policy options that best match these needs. We will get back to you shortly with the relevant information.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Okay, fine. Just make it fast, please. Thanks.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: We will prioritise this. Thank you for calling ISS Insurance. Have a good day.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: You too. Bye.
